title: Seal cracks and ventilate to remove radon gas

content.prompt: Which of the following is an appropriate remediation strategy for removing radon gas from the home?

choices.label: Use filtered water for drinking and bathing.
Do not occupy the basement of the home.
Place monitors in suspect areas of the home.
Remove and replace soil in crawl spaces under the home.
Seal or ventilate places where radon enters the living space.

skill.text: Skill 7.B: Describe potential responses or approaches to environmental problems.
